briefdescription.para: httpTune.h - Tunable parameters for the Embedthis Http Web Server

detaileddescription.para: Copyright (c) All Rights Reserved. See details at the end of the file.

briefdescription.para: Time to wait to reap exit status.
Mask to clear flags after a request completes.
Location defines a directory of applications.
Auto create sessions in this location.
Send errors back to the browser for this location.
Number of fragments in a single socket write.
Number of random bytes to use.
Packet is a range boundary packet.
Queue has all the data there is and will be.
Queue's open routine has been called.
Queue has been serviced at least once.
Queue's start routine has been called.
Must create env for this request.
No respose body, only return headers to client.
Create CGI style environment variables table.
Create query and form variables table.
Handler serves virtual resources not the physical file system.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* MaFillProc)(struct MaQueue *q, struct MaPacket *packet, MprOff pos, int size)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct MaQueue *q, struct MaPacket *packet, MprOff pos, int size)
memberdef.name: MaFillProc

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* MaListenCallback)(struct MaHttp *http, struct MaListen *listen)
memberdef.name: MaListenCallback

briefdescription.para: Add query and post form variables.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Add new variables encoded in the supplied buffer

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Compare a form variable and return true if it exists and its value matches.
True if the value matches

memberdef.argsstring: (MprCtx ctx, MaHttp *http, MaServer *server, cchar *configFile, cchar *ipAddr, int port, cchar *documentRoot)
memberdef.name: maConfigureServer

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This will configure a web server based on either a configuration file or using the supplied IP address and port.

parameterdescription.para: Any memory context object returned by mprAlloc
File name of the Appweb configuration file (appweb.conf) that defines the web server configuration.
If using a config file, set to null. Otherwise, set to a host name or IP address.
If using a config file, set to -1. Otherwise, set to the port number to listen on.
If not using a config file, set this to the directory containing the web documents to serve.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a new connector. Connectors are the final stage for outgoing data. Their job is to transmit outgoing data to the client.

parameterdescription.para:
Stage flags mask. These specify what Http request methods will be supported by this stage. Or together any of the following flags:
MA_STAGE_DELETE - Support DELETE requests
MA_STAGE_GET - Support GET requests
MA_STAGE_HEAD - Support HEAD requests
MA_STAGE_OPTIONS - Support OPTIONS requests
MA_STAGE_POST - Support POST requests
MA_STAGE_PUT - Support PUT requests
MA_STAGE_TRACE - Support TRACE requests
MA_STAGE_ALL - Mask to support all methods

simplesect.para: A new stage object

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a packet and set the MA_PACKET_DATA flag Data packets convey data through the response pipeline.

parameterdescription.para: A conn or request memory context object.
Size of the package data storage.

simplesect.para: MaPacket object.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create an end-of-stream packet and set the MA_PACKET_END flag. The end pack signifies the end of data. It is used on both incoming and outgoing streams through the request/response pipeline.

parameterdescription.para: A conn or request memory context object.

simplesect.para: MaPacket object.

memberdef.argsstring: (MprCtx ctx, MprOff pos, MprOff size, MaFillProc fill)
memberdef.name: maCreateEntityPacket

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a new filter. Filters transform data generated by handlers and before connectors transmit to the client. Filters can apply transformations to incoming, outgoing or bi-directional data.

parameterdescription.para:
Stage flags mask. These specify what Http request methods will be supported by this stage. Or together any of the following flags:
MA_STAGE_DELETE - Support DELETE requests
MA_STAGE_GET - Support GET requests
MA_STAGE_HEAD - Support HEAD requests
MA_STAGE_OPTIONS - Support OPTIONS requests
MA_STAGE_POST - Support POST requests
MA_STAGE_PUT - Support PUT requests
MA_STAGE_TRACE - Support TRACE requests
MA_STAGE_ALL - Mask to support all methods

simplesect.para: A new stage object

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a new handler. Handlers generate outgoing data and are the final stage for incoming data. Their job is to process requests and send outgoing data downstream toward the client consumer. There is ever only one handler for a request.

parameterdescription.para:
Stage flags mask. These specify what Http request methods will be supported by this stage. Or together any of the following flags:
MA_STAGE_DELETE - Support DELETE requests
MA_STAGE_GET - Support GET requests
MA_STAGE_HEAD - Support HEAD requests
MA_STAGE_OPTIONS - Support OPTIONS requests
MA_STAGE_POST - Support POST requests
MA_STAGE_PUT - Support PUT requests
MA_STAGE_TRACE - Support TRACE requests
MA_STAGE_ALL - Mask to support all methods

simplesect.para: A new stage object

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a response header packet and set the MA_PACKET_HEADER flag. A header packet is used by the pipeline to hold the response headers.

parameterdescription.para: A conn or request memory context object.

simplesect.para: MaPacket object.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The Appweb library uses a singleton MaHttp object to manage multiple embedded web servers

parameterdescription.para: Any memory context object returned by mprAlloc

simplesect.para: A MaHttp object. Use mprFree to close and release.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct MaServer *server, cchar *ipAddr, int port, int flags)
memberdef.name: maCreateListen

memberdef.argsstring: (MaHttp *http, MaConfigState *state, cchar *prefix, cchar *path, cchar *handlerName, int flags)
memberdef.name: maCreateLocationAlias

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a packet of the required size.

parameterdescription.para: A conn or request memory context object.
Size of the package data storage.

simplesect.para: MaPacket object.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct MaConn *conn, struct MaStage *stage, int direction, MaQueue *prev)
memberdef.name: maCreateQueue

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create new MaServer object. This routine creates a bare MaServer object, loads any required static modules and performs minimal configuration. To use the server object created, more configuration will be required before starting Http services. If you want a one-line embedding of Appweb, use maRunWebServer or maRunSimpleWebServer.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the web server. This name is used as the initial server name.
If not-null, create and open a listening endpoint on this IP address. If you are configuring via a config file, use maConfigureServer and set ipAddr to null.
Port number to listen on. Set to -1 if you do not want to open a listening endpoint on ipAddr:port

simplesect.para: MaServer A newly created MaServer object. Use mprFree to free and release.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a web server configuration based on the supplied config file. Once created, the web server should be run by calling maServiceWebServer. Use this routine when you need access to the MaHttp object. If you want a one-line embedding of Appweb, use maRunWebServer or maRunSimpleWebServer.

parameterdescription.para: File name of the Appweb configuration file (appweb.conf) that defines the web server configuration.

simplesect.para: MaHttp object.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This routine provides default handling of outgoing data for stages. It simply sends all packets downstream.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Mark a queue as disabled so that it will not be scheduled for service.

briefdescription.para: Discard all data from the queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Discard data from the queue. If removePackets (not yet implemented) is true, then remove the packets otherwise, just discard the data and preserve the packets.

parameterdescription.para: If true, the data packets will be removed from the queue

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Instruct the client not to cache the response body. This is done by setting the Cache-control Http header.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enable a queue for service and schedule it to run. This will cause the service routine to run as soon as possible.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Fail a request with the specified http status code. The formatted message is logged to the appweb error log.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Fill the given empty packet with the Http response headers. This should only be called by connectors just prior to sending output to the client. It should be delayed as long as possible if the content length is not yet known to give the pipeline a chance to determine the response length. This way, a non-chunked response can be sent with a content-length header. This is the fastest HTTP response.

parameterdescription.para: Packet into which to place the headers

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Format a response body to use instead of data generated by the request processing pipeline. This is typically used to send error responses and redirections.

parameterdescription.para: Title string to format into the HTML response body.

Printf style formatted string. This string may contain HTML tags and is not HTML encoded before sending to the user. NOTE: Do not send user input back to the client using this method. Otherwise you open large security holes.

simplesect.para: A count of the number of bytes in the response body.

briefdescription.para: Get the next packet from a queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the next packet. This will remove the packet from the queue and adjust the queue counts accordingly. If the queue was full and upstream queues were blocked, they will be enabled.
The packet removed from the queue.

memberdef.argsstring: (MprCtx ctx, char **arg, char *buf, char **nextToken, int quotes)
memberdef.name: maGetConfigValue

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the cookies defined in the current requeset
Return a string containing the cookies sent in the Http header of the last request

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the value of a named form variable. Form variables are define via www-urlencoded query or post data contained in the request.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the form variable to retrieve
Default value to return if the variable is not defined. Can be null.

simplesect.para: String containing the form variable's value. Caller should not free.

briefdescription.para: Get a form variable as an integer.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the value of a named form variable as an integer. Form variables are define via www-urlencoded query or post data contained in the request.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the form variable to retrieve
Default value to return if the variable is not defined. Can be null.

simplesect.para: Integer containing the form variable's value

briefdescription.para: Get the length of the packet data contents.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the content length of a packet. This does not include the prefix or suffix data length -- just the pure data contents.
Count of bytes contained by the packet.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get query string sent with the current request.
String containing the request query string. Caller should not free.

briefdescription.para: Get the room in the queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the amount of data the queue can accept before being full.
A count of bytes that can be written to the queue

briefdescription.para: Determine if the queue is empty.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Determine if the queue has no packets queued. This does not test if the queue has no data content.
True if there are no packets queued.

briefdescription.para: Join a packet onto the service queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Add a packet to the service queue. If the queue already has data, then this packet will be joined (aggregated) into the existing packet. If serviceQ is true, the queue will be scheduled for service.

parameterdescription.para: Packet to join to the queue
If true, schedule the queue for service

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Join the contents of one packet to another by copying the data from the other packet into the first packet.

parameterdescription.para: Other packet to copy data from.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Load the statically configured modules, handlers, filters and connectors. The configure program can specify a static or shared build of Appweb. The maCreateServer routine will call maLoadStaticModules automatically. It should not be called by in user programs.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This looks up the stage by name and returns the private stage data.
Reference to the stage data block.

briefdescription.para: Test if a packet is too big.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Test if a packet is too big to fit downstream. If the packet content exceeds the downstream queue's maximum or exceeds the downstream queue's requested packet size -- then this routine will return true.
True if the packet is too big for the downstream queue

briefdescription.para: Put a packet onto a queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Put the packet onto the end of queue by calling the queue's put() method.

briefdescription.para: Put a packet back onto a queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Put the packet back onto the front of the queue. The queue's put() method is not called. This is typically used by the queue's service routine when a packet cannot complete processing.

briefdescription.para: Put a packet onto the service queue.

detaileddescription.para: Put a packet onto a service queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Add a packet to the service queue. If serviceQ is true, the queue will be scheduled for service.

parameterdescription.para: Packet to join to the queue
If true, schedule the queue for service

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Put the packet onto the service queue and optionally schedule the queue for service.

briefdescription.para: Put a packet onto the next queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Put a packet onto the next downstream queue by calling the downstreams queue's put() method.

parameterdescription.para: Queue reference. The packet will not be queued on this queue, but rather on the queue downstream.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Redirect the client to a new uri.

parameterdescription.para: Http status code to send with the response

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Remove a queue from the request/response pipeline. This will remove a queue so that it does not participate in the pipeline, effectively removing the processing stage from the pipeline. This is useful to remove unwanted filters and to speed up pipeline processing

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Resize a packet if required so that it fits in the downstream queue. This may split the packet if it is too big to fit in the downstream queue. If it is split, the tail portion is put back on the queue.

parameterdescription.para: If size is > 0, then also ensure the packet is not larger than this size.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code

briefdescription.para: Create and run a simple web server listening on a single IP address.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a simple web server without using a configuration file. The server is created to listen on the specified IP addresss and port. This routine provides is a one-line embedding of Appweb. If you want to use a config file, try the maRunWebServer instead. If you need more control, try maCreateWebServer which exposes the MaHttp object.

parameterdescription.para: IP address on which to listen. Set to "0.0.0.0" to listen on all interfaces.
Directory containing the documents to serve.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

briefdescription.para: Create and run a web server based on a configuration file.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a web server configuration based on the supplied config file. This routine provides is a one-line embedding of Appweb. If you don't want to use a config file, try the maRunSimpleWebServer instead. If you need more control, try maCreateWebServer which exposes the MaHttp object.

parameterdescription.para: File name of the Appweb configuration file (appweb.conf) that defines the web server configuration.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Schedule a queue by adding it to the schedule queue. Queues are serviced FIFO.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create and send an end-of-stream packet downstream

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Send all queued packets downstream

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Service a queue by invoking its service() routine.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Run a web server configuration. This is will start http services via maStartHttp and will service incoming Http requests until instructed to exit. This is often used in conjunction with maCreateWebServer.

parameterdescription.para: Http object created via maCreateWebServer or maCreateHttp.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

memberdef.argsstring: (MaConn *conn, cchar *name, cchar *value, cchar *path, cchar *domain, int lifetime, bool secure)
memberdef.name: maSetCookie

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Define a cookie to send in the response Http header

parameterdescription.para: URI path to which the cookie applies
Domain in which the cookie applies. Must have 2-3 dots.
Duration for the cookie to persist in seconds
Set to true if the cookie only applies for SSL based connections

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set the value of a named form variable to a string value. Form variables are define via www-urlencoded query or post data contained in the request.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the form variable to retrieve
Default value to return if the variable is not defined. Can be null.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set the response header. If allowMultiple is true, then duplicate keys can be defined. Otherwise, prior key headers are overwritten.

parameterdescription.para: If true, allow duplicate keys of the same value
Printf style formatted string to use as the header key value

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Define the group name under which to run the Appweb service

parameterdescription.para: Group name. Must be defined in the system group file.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Define the user name under which to run the Appweb service

parameterdescription.para: User name. Must be defined in the system password file.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set the value of a named form variable to an integer value. Form variables are define via www-urlencoded query or post data contained in the request.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the form variable to retrieve
Default value to return if the variable is not defined. Can be null.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set the Http response code for the request. This defaults to 200 (OK).

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set the response mime type Http header.

memberdef.argsstring: (MprCtx ctx, char **s1, char **s2, char *buf, int quotes)
memberdef.name: maSplitConfigValue

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Split a data packet at the specified offset. Packets may need to be split so that downstream stages can digest their contents. If a packet is too large for the queue maximum size, it should be split. When the packet is split, a new packet is created containing the data after the offset. Any suffix headers are moved to the new packet.

parameterdescription.para: A conn or request memory context object to own the packet.
Location in the original packet at which to split

simplesect.para: New MaPacket object containing the data after the offset. No need to free, unless you have a very long running request. Otherwise the packet memory will be released automatically when the request completes.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This starts listening for requests on all configured servers.
Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This stops listening for requests on all configured servers. Shutdown is somewhat graceful.
Zero if successful, otherwise a negative Mpr error code. See the Appweb log for diagnostics.

briefdescription.para: Test if a form variable is defined.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the form variable to retrieve

simplesect.para: True if the form variable is defined

memberdef.argsstring: (MaConn *conn, MaPacket *packet, int64 size, int64 offset, int mask)
memberdef.name: maTraceContent

memberdef.argsstring: (struct MaConn *conn, cchar *realm, cchar *user, cchar *password, cchar *requiredPass, char **msg)
memberdef.name: maValidateNativeCredentials

briefdescription.para: Determine if the downstream queue will accept this packet.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Test if the downstream queue will accept a packet. The packet will be resized if required in an attempt to get the downstream queue to accept it. If the downstream queue is full, disable this queue and mark the downstream queue as full and service it immediately to try to relieve the congestion.
True if the downstream queue will accept the packet. Use maPutNext to send the packet downstream

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Write a formatted string of data into packets onto the end of the queue. Data packets will be created as required to store the write data. This call may block waiting for the downstream queue to drain if it is or becomes full.
A count of the bytes actually written

briefdescription.para: Write a block of data to the queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Write a block of data into packets onto the end of the queue. Data packets will be created as required to store the write data.

parameterdescription.para: Set to true to block and wait for data to drain if the downstream queue is full. If false, the call may return not having written all the data. The return value indicates how many bytes were actually written.

simplesect.para: A count of the bytes actually written

briefdescription.para: Write a string of data to the queue.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Write a string of data into packets onto the end of the queue. Data packets will be created as required to store the write data. This call may block waiting for the downstream queue to drain if it is or becomes full.

parameterdescription.para: String containing the data to write

simplesect.para: A count of the bytes actually written
